Package ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear

Class ExtensiveHalfspaceFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.ExtensiveHalfspaceFactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtensiveLinearFactor<ExtensiveHalfspaceFactor>, LinearFactor, GenericFactor
    public class ExtensiveHalfspaceFactor
extends Object
implements ExtensiveLinearFactor<ExtensiveHalfspaceFactor>
    An extensive credal factor where the bounds are expressed as a set of Linear constraints over the whole domain of the factor.
    Author:
    david
